8c77fbf5-ade4-444d-803a-6cc2eae239b2.description: Earners of the CNG+ badge have been members of CoreNet Global for 5 or more consecutive years and continue to be an active member.
8c77fbf5-ade4-444d-803a-6cc2eae239b2.name: Loyal Member

badge_template_activities.title: Recipients have held continuous membership in CoreNet Global for 5 years or more.

a28a1c16-1a31-448f-b479-51700f1667e8.description: The CoreNet Global Master of Corporate Real Estate (MCR) is the corporate real estate (CRE) profession’s most prestigious designation. The MCR professional designation was established in 1982 as a comprehensive career development program. Courses are designed for CRE professionals with five or more years of experience. Continuing professional development is required to maintain the designation.
a28a1c16-1a31-448f-b479-51700f1667e8.name: MCR

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals who have earned the MCR have demonstrated their ability to: 1) Perform financial analysis, develop sound business cases, identify risks in the real estate portfolio, and recommend risk mitigation strategies. 2) Develop real estate strategies that effectively support the goals of the business. 3) Analyze the impacts of real estate decisions on financial statements and how these impacts are viewed by senior management. 4) Effectively assess and manage area estate portfolio.

Candidates are required to successfully complete a series of six courses and related assessments: 1) Corporate Real Estate Finance 2) Real Estate's Impact on Financial Statements 3) Enterprise Alignment 4) Workplace Strategy Essentials 4) Qualifying Professional Development Seminar 5) Capstone: Leadership and Strategy MCR Assessment

4b0f83d6-5f26-442e-bd55-8afaf4e590f3.description: Those with the Chapter Leader badge are currently serving in a volunteer capacity on a local chapter board.
4b0f83d6-5f26-442e-bd55-8afaf4e590f3.name: CoreNet Global Chapter Leaders

badge_template_activities.title: Serve in a volunteer capacity, typically for at least one year, on a local chapter board.

1314565c-38bf-4dbf-a30a-d26e9983c063.description: People who have attended 5 or more CoreNet Global Summits in North America
1314565c-38bf-4dbf-a30a-d26e9983c063.name: Loyal Summit Attendee - North America

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 5 or more Global Summits in North America

59858328-9786-4673-8e6f-ed128933cba1.description: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Certificate (DEI) is designed to eliminate discrimination and promote equality in the workplace. Individuals who earn the DEI Certificate are able to: 1) Describe best practices of corporate Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Programs 2) Discuss the negative impact discrimination and cultural bias play within organizations 3) Identify common conscious and unconscious bias and inequalities which, when addressed, can foster a diverse and inclusive culture.
59858328-9786-4673-8e6f-ed128933cba1.name: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

badge_template_activities.title: The certificate program covers a broad range of diversity, equity, and inclusion topics through a series of webinar recordings. To earn the certificate, participants must complete at least six webinars.

6f59a050-bfcb-4b16-a567-ea5f833cd539.description: "The CoreNet Global Senior Leader of Corporate Real Estate (SLCR) designation program focuses on the development of critical leadership skills for CRE professionals positioning themselves for a greater role in their organization. This program is designed to broaden business perspective, enhance strategic approach to decision making, hone your financial analysis skills, and expand your leadership abilities.
6f59a050-bfcb-4b16-a567-ea5f833cd539.name: SLCR

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals who have earned the SLCR have demonstrated their ability to: 1) Create value by leveraging leadership skills to drive CRE strategies 2) Enhance their approach to strategic decision making 3) Hone their financial analysis skills 4) Collaborate across corporate functions and service partners 5) Understand work and how the infrastructure can most effectively enable it 6) Effectively lead change initiatives 7) Become a stronger, more influential leader
Candidates are required to successfully complete a series of six courses

0e52944d-19d1-4bb8-8f80-a4f18e3d2e68.description: The Employee Experience certificate program is designed to explore the state of the art in program strategy and implementation. Participants are encouraged to expand their view of employee experience strategies from a human resource on-boarding process to one of partnership between human resource, information technology and corporate real estate professionals. Hear how corporate leaders are collaboratively working to develop a positive corporate culture.
0e52944d-19d1-4bb8-8f80-a4f18e3d2e68.name: Employee Experience Certificate Program (EX)

badge_template_activities.title: The certificate program covers best practices in design and delivery of Employee Experience programs across the enterprise. Case studies are presented to illustrate topics through a series of webinar recordings. To earn the certificate, participants must complete at least six webinars.

51077c7e-7d8a-421f-ae4c-6e3d271c3207.description: The Qualified Professionals in Corporate Real Estate (QPCR) designation equips those with limited experience in the corporate real estate (CRE) profession with a foundation and framework for further growth and professional development. Designed for those with fewer than five years of experience in corporate real estate, courses cover a wide range of topics unique to the CRE role as well as general business and leadership skills that are applicable to nearly any business role.
51077c7e-7d8a-421f-ae4c-6e3d271c3207.name: QPCR

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates are required to complete 70 hours of coursework in two broad areas: Corporate Real Estate Knowledge and Business and Leadership Skills
QPCR courses are designed for individuals with fewer than five years of experience in corporate real estate. No experience is required.

0b36c237-1703-4c62-960e-70572e7eecbd.description: The CoreNet Global MCR is the corporate real estate (CRE) profession’s most prestigious professional designation. The MCR.w indicates a specialization in workplace strategy methodologies and practice. Courses are designed for CRE professionals with five or more years of experience. Continuing professional development is required to maintain the designation.
0b36c237-1703-4c62-960e-70572e7eecbd.name: MCR.w

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the MCR professional designation.
In addition to six courses required to earn the MCR, MCR.w candidates must complete: Workplace Strategy, Workplace Methodologies, and Workplace Strategy in Practice.

ddf7b298-7317-4ab0-8001-a93033918d51.description: CoreNet Global Professional Development Program Faculty are subject matter experts who volunteer their time to facilitate courses in the MCR and QPCR professional designation programs.
ddf7b298-7317-4ab0-8001-a93033918d51.name: Faculty

badge_template_activities.title: Recognized as a subject matter expert in their area of specialization
Has demonstrated the ability to interactively present course materials, facilitate small group discussions and effectively integrate their professional experiences with course materials.
Course participant evaluation scores are used to select Top Rated Faculty.

55e095a7-1c45-40bb-87da-9e1658b513d7.description: Each year the top-rated speakers from each Summit are recognized as Luminary Award winners. This recognition is a symbol of excellence, presented to those achieving performance ratings in the top 10% of all speakers at each Summit. The Luminary Award recognizes the attainment of eminence and inspiration amongst Summit speakers. Luminary Awards are presented at the regional Summit.
55e095a7-1c45-40bb-87da-9e1658b513d7.name: Luminary

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve performance ratings in the top 10% of all speakers at the Global Summit (Regions: APAC, EMEA, North America)

202d426f-435d-4cb1-904a-10dee945958d.description: After fulfilling their term as a CoreNet Global board member, a past board member continues representing the organization. They are life long ambassadors for the organization and share their insights and expertise with the CoreNet Global community.
202d426f-435d-4cb1-904a-10dee945958d.name: Past Board Member

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient is a past member of the CoreNet Global Board of Directors.

183a4bda-0779-4ed6-869b-1ac4f0807c00.description: Top Rated Faculty are those learning faculty who consistently receive excellent seminar evaluation ratings from QPCR and MCR professional designation program participants.
183a4bda-0779-4ed6-869b-1ac4f0807c00.name: Top Rated Faculty

badge_template_activities.title: Recognized as a subject matter expert in their area of specialization.
Has demonstrated the ability to interactively present course materials, facilitate small group discussions and effectively integrate their professional experiences with course materials.

7ebf7c6f-5578-4b23-98e4-ae423dd81b3f.description: Earners of the Mentor badge have successfully completed a mentoring relationship by encourging and guiding a mentee with their questions and concerns.
7ebf7c6f-5578-4b23-98e4-ae423dd81b3f.name: Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Accept and complete at least one mentoring relationship with system verification.

f0a95c37-b142-42c7-b5d7-3eead7b098a7.description: Those with the Chapter Leader badge are currently serving in a volunteer capacity as Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Ambassadors.
f0a95c37-b142-42c7-b5d7-3eead7b098a7.name: Chapter Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Serve in a volunteer capacity as a Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Ambassador.

b34e620d-470a-499e-ada5-663c00d072e0.description: The CoreNet Global Campus Ambassador Program builds on the pre-existing relationships so many members have with their alma maters in order to raise awareness of corporate real estate (CRE) and the rewarding career opportunities available to students. Ambassadors serve two roles: a personal point-of-contact for faculty, staff, and students to raise awareness of CRE; and a relationship manager for CoreNet Global with institutional memory and knowledge.
b34e620d-470a-499e-ada5-663c00d072e0.name: CoreNet Global Campus Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Where appropriate, Ambassadors can encourage engagement with a local chapter/networking group. Ambassadors are intended to complement and augment the work of existing chapter University Outreach efforts, not replace them; in addition, Campus Ambassadors can help extend the reach of CoreNet Global to places without chapter/networking group representation.
Must be a current CoreNet Global member. Current members must apply and be accepted into the Campus Ambassador Program.

335cc30d-1a7b-4e0b-8b46-fad1acfd6348.description: People who have attended 5 or more CoreNet Global Summits in APAC.
335cc30d-1a7b-4e0b-8b46-fad1acfd6348.name: Loyal Summit Attendee - APAC

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 5 or more Global Summits in the APAC region

7f3e15a8-aa3b-4d10-b71e-7ae89cde93e4.description: People who have attended 5 or more CoreNet Global Summits in EMEA.
7f3e15a8-aa3b-4d10-b71e-7ae89cde93e4.name: Loyal Summit Attendee - EMEA

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 5 or more Global Summits in the EMEA region

517533c7-41df-4647-9c1b-c6cbb5d8ad9d.description: Earners of the Mentee badge have successfully completed and mentoring relationship by receiving guidance from an knowledgable and skilled mentor.
517533c7-41df-4647-9c1b-c6cbb5d8ad9d.name: CoreNet Global Mentee

badge_template_activities.title: Accept and complete at least one mentoring relationship with system verification

dc87b403-d1e7-4a37-8b17-893ebdcbee10.description: A CoreNet Global board member serves as an advocate for the organization promoting its mission and vision. They dedicate themselves to the profession and responsibilities of the global organization at large. Board members have a unique opportunity to use their knowledge and thought leadership expertise to vote on strategic and governance policies that guide the organization.
dc87b403-d1e7-4a37-8b17-893ebdcbee10.name: CoreNet Global Board Member

badge_template_activities.title: Serve on the CoreNet Global Board of Directors

24d2231b-2d0a-4c0c-a56d-5a7f9595bd98.description: This recognition is designed to pay tribute to the pioneers, thought leaders, trailblazers, role models, mentors, change agents and provocateurs who helped define and shape the corporate real estate profession through their body of work. This is CoreNet Global’s highest honor/recognition, akin to a “lifetime achievement” award.
24d2231b-2d0a-4c0c-a56d-5a7f9595bd98.name: CoreNet Global Distinguished Leaders Circle

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient has been inducted into the CoreNet Global Distinguished Leaders Circle.

1f5d84c9-ec31-47d1-b09d-a24f46675024.description: The CRE Executive of the Year is an award given to an exceptional End User member based on contributions to their company and the profession over the last year. Candidates are nominated by their local chapter and a global selection of judges review the criteria to determine the winner.
1f5d84c9-ec31-47d1-b09d-a24f46675024.name: Corporate Real Estate (CRE) Executive of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: This award recognizes the corporate real estate (CRE) executive who made outstanding and distinguished contributions to his/her company and to the profession. It is aimed at acknowledging the achievements of the nominee within the past year. CoreNet Global seeks to recognize: 1) Achievements in contributing to company success 2) Contributions for elevating the practice of corporate real estate (CRE) 3) Contributions to the CRE profession as educator or leader 4) Current CoreNet Global membership

f3b559ed-cb13-42d5-a6ec-9358fea17ccd.description: Earners of the Young Leader of the Year badge have been recipients of CoreNet Global's H. Gordon Wyllie, MCR, Young Leader of the Year award. The Young Leader of the Year is an up-and-comer to watch in the profession. Candidates come from local CoreNet Global chapters and a global selection of judges review the criteria to determine the winner.
f3b559ed-cb13-42d5-a6ec-9358fea17ccd.name: Young Leader of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: This award recognizes the Young Leader of the Year who has shown dedication and enthusiasm for their work, exemplifies excellence and should be considered ‘one to watch’ in the broad field of corporate real estate (CRE) in any member category.

064f4864-73da-4f8b-a6c8-ed1c731d4590.description: CoreNet Global’s Strategic Partnership Program represents the most extensive level of involvement attainable in the Association. Representing the backbone of CoreNet Global’s drive to influence both thought and action in the corporate real estate profession, participating companies have the opportunity to network with key end-users from top corporations and align themselves with the main issues of the day.
064f4864-73da-4f8b-a6c8-ed1c731d4590.name: Bronze Strategic Partner Member

badge_template_activities.title: Proud CoreNet Global Strategic Partner

0b22f0bc-2785-45c0-83cb-e33f354326b8.description: CoreNet Global Corporate Partners are an elite group of multinational and national corporations that understand how the strategic management of their corporation's real estate portfolio adds value and supports business strategy. A Corporate Partnership is an annual investment in talent development as a strategic support function. Access to CoreNet Global's global knowledge network helps reduce costs, maximize efficiencies, and better align real estate management to corporate goals.
0b22f0bc-2785-45c0-83cb-e33f354326b8.name: CoreNet Global Corporate Partner

badge_template_activities.title: CoreNet Global Corporate Partners are an elite group of multinational and national corporations that truly understand how the strategic management of their corporation's real estate portfolio adds value and supports business strategy.

1656a884-0bf5-4fc4-a644-7e8a89283eac.description: Proud CoreNet Global Summit | Gem Sponsor
1656a884-0bf5-4fc4-a644-7e8a89283eac.name: Diamond Summit Sponsor

badge_template_activities.title: Summit "Gem Sponsors" purchase sponsorship packages that provide them an elevated level of exposure and visibility. CoreNet Global depends on these sponsors for financial support in order to deliver a unique and quality Summit experience.

3ae9aa74-ae6b-42f4-baf6-911dffcd959e.description: Proud CoreNet Global Summit | Gem Sponsor

a2001c87-b433-4533-883d-ecc9e5186f06.description: The Executive Leaders Council is a group intended to facilitate the highest level of peer to peer engagement with other CRE executives committed to advancing corporate real estate.
a2001c87-b433-4533-883d-ecc9e5186f06.name: Executive Leaders Council

badge_template_activities.title: Part of Corporate Partner Program
